synopsis.text: Candy is an optimistic and kindhearted orphan girl who grew up in an orphanage called Pony's Home. There she had a best friend named Annie and met a mysterious "Prince of the Hill," an important figure in her life. Candy gets adopted by the cruel Leagan family, where she faces hardships from the spiteful Neil and Eliza. One day in the rose garden, she meets Anthony, a boy bearing an uncanny resemblance to her "Prince of the Hill." This fateful encounter marks the beginning of an unexpected adventure in Candy's life, filled with friendships, heartbreaks, and the overarching search for her long-lost beloved prince. Through tears and laughter, across countries and continents, Candy perseveres with resilience and dreams of the day she is finally reunited with her dear "Prince of the Hill."
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
